title: My whole team afk including me
body: So i was about to play a ranked game this morning at about 6.30 am... Everyone picked their champions and everything was good until champion select froze i then closed leauge of legends and reopened it but when i went to clock reconect to game the button wasn't working.. i couldn't connect to the game so i tried my best to fix it i even reinstalled my client which took ages after that i looked at my match history and my whole team was afk but the other team had all their players except for 1 who was also afk i lost points for this so im a little bit upset if someone higher up in power is reading this maybe u could give me my points back and all my teammates too please that would be much appreciated :D

replies.body:
That really sucks =( 
Hopefully you will receive the help you need =)
Was in the same game! Had the same problem. Lost my promos because of this.
Yeah someone should do something about this.. Probs not tho coz oce lol
